title: Digital Graphic Designer - USA-FL-Miami
text:
preferredThe utilization of specified computerized graphic design programs: Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, Flash, and PremiereProgramming/coding, including in-depth understanding of latest coding languages: HTML, CSS, Javascript, and other related languages and technologiesUser experience development and/or designMicrosoft Office SuiteResponsibilities:Conceptualize, plan, design, and produce a wide range of specialized graphic and/or illustrative material, to include multimedia concepts, as appropriateWork with clientele to ascertain needs and to develop graphic directions, concepts, and specifications for assigned projectsDesign and produce electronic presentations and camera-ready art including graphs, charts, clip art, posters, digitization of graphics, line-art, and/or photosCreate electronically-designed page layouts and import word processing files into page layouts, as appropriate to the position; may develop and produce web-based graphics, as requestedConceptualize, design, and produce communication, marketing and public relations materials such as flyers, ads, brochures, and/or logosManage progress of multiple projects simultaneously and on schedule; proactively communicate progress, changes, and delivery status to internal customersConsult with staff and other personnel to identify their graphic needs, budget constraints, and reasonable deadlines for the project; serve as a liaison between the client and printers when requiredInstruct users in equipment operationMaintain appropriate records and inventory of productionCoordinate graphics or photographic library and/or maintain digital recordsWrite and edit, as appropriateCoordinate and lead the work of othersPerform other duties as assigned Company info Website : http://www.ryder.com 
Company Profile Ryder System, Inc. is a leading provider of commercial transportation, logistics, and supply chain management solutions, serving customers throughout North America, Europe and Asia. Over the past 80 years, Ryder has earned a reputation for delivering solutions that ease complexity and increase efficiency for companies of all sizes. An industry-leading FORTUNE® 500 company, Ryder’s products and services encompass everything from fleet management to large-scale supply chain solutions and turnkey transportation solutions, making commerce flow more efficiently, reliably, and safely for everyone. Employer job
